Subject: Management Server Low Disk Space
Description: Your appliance is running low on disk space, there is 80.1 gb free available from 257.22 gb (31%). EPP Server functionality and performance may be severely affected. Use Audit Log Backup to reduce the logs stored in the database, delete older system and audit log backups, and tune policies to reduce incoming log count. For further assistance contact Support.
What_We_Know__c:
3/10/2025

- Joined remote session
- Checked the partition for /var/eppfiles/* and found that /var/eppfiles/shadows/ at 149 G
- Customer requested to delete shadow files
- found and deleted shadow files 180 and 60 days old
- /var/eppfiles/shadows now at 4 K
- Customer requested to close case

3/6/2025
- Joined Zoom session
- Emailed customer to join Zoom session and  and waited 25 minutes
- Ended Zoom session and emailed customer to send to let us know when he will be available


3/4/2025

• What is the impact of the issue on your business? If the management server runs out of space it will become unusable.
• Have you attempted any troubleshooting steps yet? If so, what have you tried? I have deleted a backup file to gain about 1.5GB back. The shadow files I'm unable to delete. The system crashes. I have had this issue for a long time. A support person generally gets on a zoom meeting with me, logs into the management console with elevated rights, and deletes the shadow files manually.
• What are you trying to do or accomplish? Redundant question
• When did this issue start? two years ago
• Can you please let us know the Client, Server, OS version (if not already known) on which the situation is encountered? This detail is asked in the standard ticket questions and have already been answered.
• On what platform is your Endpoint Protector hosted? (on-prem, AWS, Google cloud platform, Azure, Hosted by EPP on AWS). This has also already been answered in your standard ticket questions (on-prem)
• Screen shots, logs, other artifacts, etc.
2/28/2025
Customer is reporting low disk space from on-prem EPP server
Customer is OOO until March 3rd
Solution_Comment__c: - Deleted shadow files from /var/eppfiles/shadows/ that were 180 and 60 days old
